definitions.definition: A white liquid produced by the mammary glands of female mammals to nourish their young . From certain animals , especially cows , it is also called dairy milk and is a common food for humans as a beverage or used to produce various dairy products such as butter , cheese , and yogurt .
examples: Skyr is a product made of curdled milk .

definitions.definition: A white (or whitish) liquid obtained from a vegetable source such as almonds , coconuts , oats , rice , or soy beans .
An individual portion of milk, such as found in a creamer , for tea and coffee.
examples: I take my tea with two milks and two sugars.
I take my tea with two milk and two sugar.

definitions.definition: The ripe, undischarged spat of an oyster .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A white liquid produced by the mammary glands of female mammals to nourish their young . From certain animals , especially cows , it is also called dairy milk and is a common food for humans as a beverage or used to produce various dairy products such as butter , cheese , and yogurt .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , by extension ) A white (or whitish) liquid obtained from a vegetable source such as almonds , coconuts , oats , rice , or soy beans .
( countable , informal ) An individual serving of milk.
( countable or invariant ) An individual portion of milk, such as found in a creamer , for tea and coffee.
The ripe, undischarged spat of an oyster .
